title: Bug 10022: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be enabled only when there are changes or updates to the project that need to be built.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the Java perspective and check that the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu is enabled regardless of whether there are any changes or updates to the project.
